body_content.explanation: (of a piece of clothing) with buttons fastened, especially in a way that looks tidy and formal:
examples: He is dressed in a suit with a buttoned-up shirt but no tie.
They think they're so important in their buttoned-up suits.
We prefer our shirts buttoned up.

body_content.explanation: formal or serious, and not willing to reveal your feelings or personal opinions:
examples: She was cast as a buttoned-up lawyer with a secret inner life.
He is less buttoned-up, more emotional than his rival.
The experience made her even more buttoned up and less willing to confide in anyone.
